text: Robert Horton (Meade Howard Horton, Jr., July 29, 1924 - March 9, 2016) was an American television actor. Horton was known for his role as Flint McCullough in the NBC western show Wagon Train. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Horton died at a clinic in Los Angeles, California on March 9, 2016. He was aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Official site Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Robert Horton
